source.name: GSA PBS Environmental Risk Index (ERIN)
source.description: ERIN is a measure of the environmental and health risk presented by PBS facilities. It is designed to serve as a prima facie indicator of the overall environmental performance of each building. ERIN is not a comprehensive environmental compliance review, nor is it a measure of an asset's "greenness". Fourteen risk categories are addressed in the ERI. These are listed below in priority order: 1.Hazardous Waste2.Asbestos3.Indoor Air Quality4.Hazardous Materials5.Subsurface Contamination6.Lead7.PCB8.Storage Tanks9.Air/Ozone10.Drinking Water (PBS provided)11.Drinking Water (Utility provided)12.Wastewater13.Radon14.Stormwater
